comment.author: 41841084@N00
comment._content: Is this Pulpit Rock?  I traveled to Sydney and did a day tour of the Blue Mountains.  Our guide taught us to play a didgeridoo at a place he called "Pulpit Rock".  Looks a LOT like this.

comment.author: 8822983@N08
comment._content: Pulpit Hill and Pulpit Rock, named 1815, are situated west of Katoomba near the Explorers Tree, this view is near Olympian Rock at Wentworth Falls

comment.author: 50543919@N06
comment._content: Sorry guys, this is not the Grose Valley. The photo is taken from near "Dog Rock" on the Prince Henry Cliff Walk looking west with the Orphan Rock on the right and the RuinedCastle on the left. I'm afrain Mr king was mistaken when he titled this plate.
